Plot: A rag-tag team of Reno cops are called in to save the day after a terrorist attack disrupts a national police convention in Miami Beach during spring break. Based on the Comedy Central series.
Title: Reno 911!: Miami
Writer: Robert Ben Garant, Thomas Lennon, Kerri Kenney, Robert Ben Garant (TV series), Thomas Lennon (TV series), Kerri Kenney (TV series)
Actors: Lennie Loftin, Danny DeVito, Robert Ben Garant, Niecy Nash
tomatoConsensus: Reno 911!'s anarchic brand of comedy loses much in translation to the big screen where it feels slapdash and shallow.
